body: Would be good to sync up this one with Zach's PR, because if we have statically typed tuples, then we could use them in `for` loops too. We might want to avoid having two different methods in `SugaredValues` for this
body_html: Would be good to sync up this one with Zach's PR, because if we have statically typed tuples, then we could use them in for loops too. We might want to avoid having two different methods in SugaredValues for this
